name: Backup Share Parameters
description: Set application-specific parameters for Mac OS Time Machine Backup Server

parameters.name: Hostname
parameters.description: Hostname for the NAS Server container

parameters.name: Username
parameters.description: Username for the NAS Server container

parameters.name: Password
parameters.description: The password for the Samba user.

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: UID for the user and mount permissions. Will be used consistently on VE host and LXC container.

parameters.name: GID
parameters.description: GID for the user and mount permissions. Will be used consistently on VE host and LXC container.
